data: “No, Carter! I shall not go back until I have got my hands on that wretched crook, William Pike, and I don’t care if it leads me into the very heart of this strange country where they say a white man never has come from alive.”
Nick Carter Stories No. 134, April 3, 1915; The Secret of Shangore; Or, Nick Carter Among the Spearmen
browsing: crime/mystery|browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: crime, thrillers and mystery|category: adventure
